item.title: Tools
item.author: Author
item.description: Tools In this page you can find some of the active and public tools I am involved in. AbU-lang: a programming language for distributed and decentralized IoT applications, based on ECA rules and attribute-based interaction. The language is developed in collaboration with the MADS team at the University of Udine. ECA rules 路 Distributed systems 路 Formal methods 路 Edge computing 路 IoT programming More details, and the tools available (like compilers and simulators), can be found at the language GitHub page: RestTestGen: a framework for automated black-box testing of RESTful APIs, developed by the SEUnivr team at the University of Verona.
